fullDescription.intro: This layer flattens the layer input in each but the batch dimension. Corresponds to the Keras Flatten Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.

ul.li: channels_last: corresponds to inputs with shape (..., channels)
channels_first: corresponds to inputs with shape (channels, ...)

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Flatten layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Flatten layer.
